p: The frozen stock viruses were recovered in HEp-2 cells and harvested from cultures when cytopathological effects were observed in 80% of cells. RSV RNA was extracted from 200 µL of a cultured supernatant using High Pure Viral Nucleic Acid Kit (Roche). A viral cDNA synthesis was performed using random primers and the High-Capacity cDNA Reverse Transcription Kit (Applied Biosystems).
